title: Medication Reminders
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me to take my medication so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence.

summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me to take my medications so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence.

title: Voice Interaction with Feedback for Task Confirmation
summary: As an older adult, I want to receive clear feedback after issuing voice commands so that I can be confident that my tasks are being executed correctly.

title: Voice Interaction for Daily Task Management
summary: As an older adult, I want to use voice commands to manage my daily tasks so that I can maintain my independence without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Medication Reminder Support
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to remind me to take my medications so that I can manage my health efficiently and maintain my independence.

title: Voice Interaction Accessibility Features
summary: As an older adult, I want to interact with ALFRED using voice commands and have features that accommodate my mobility and cognitive challenges so that I can manage my daily tasks independently and comfortably.

title: User Guidance and Error Recovery for Enhanced Interaction
summary: As an older adult, I want clear guidance and support for using ALFRED so that I can confidently interact with the system without feeling overwhelmed or frustrated.

title: Voice Profiles for Personalized Interaction
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to recognize my voice and preferences so that I can receive personalized responses and assistance tailored to my needs.

title: Enhanced Voice Interaction with Third-Party Services
summary: As an older adult, I want to easily interact with third-party services through voice commands so that I can manage my daily tasks and stay connected without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Customizable Voice Command Options
summary: As an older adult, I want to customize voice commands for common tasks so that I can interact with ALFRED more easily and reduce my frustration with technology.
